subject: Generate wave 17+ br tool ideas
prompt: You are Lucidia, the BlackRoad AI assistant. We have built 140 developer CLI tools (br rate, br cache, br audit, br webhook, br deps, br pi-domains, etc.). Suggest 10 more powerful developer tools for the BlackRoad br CLI that would complete the ecosystem. Focus on: AI workflows, cloud automation, developer productivity, security. Format as JSON array with name, description, subcommands.
